name: SANTA MARIA PUBLIC AIRPORT DISTRICT
description: Client is a public commercial airport.
sampleDescriptions: Assist client with intergovernmental relations, primarily FAA, including but not limited to USFWS, Congress and the Department of Defense, all possible in addition.
Airport district requires assistance with FAA and other potential federal agencies as it seeks to expand its operations.
Airport district requires assistance with FAA and other potential federal agencies as it seeks to expand its operations. Airport also requires assistance dealing with ESA issues with USFWS.
Airport requires assistance in working with ESA issues with USFWS.
